about.description: I am a Backend Developer with 3 years of experience in developing scalable and secure applications. I have worked on various technologies like Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, and AWS. I have also worked on various projects like E-commerce, Social Media, and Real-time Chat applications. I am passionate about learning new technologies and implementing them in my projects.

experience.description: I am working as a Backend Developer in the company. I am responsible for developing scalable and secure applications. I have worked on various projects like E-commerce, Social Media, and Real-time Chat applications. I have also worked on technologies like Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, and AWS.

I worked as a Software Engineer in the company. I was responsible for developing web applications using technologies like Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and MySQL. I have also worked on AWS for deploying applications.

projects.title: E-commerce Application
projects.description: Developed an E-commerce application using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js. Implemented features like product listing, product details, cart, checkout, and payment gateway integration.

projects.title: Social Media Application
projects.description: Developed a Social Media application using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js. Implemented features like user authentication, post creation, like, comment, and share functionality.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a Real-time Chat application using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Socket.io. Implemented features like real-time messaging, group chat, and online status.
